product.name: Travel/Riding Friendly Outdoor Convertible Pack Port Suit

attributes.name: Sleeve
attributes.value: Full sleeves with elasticated fastening for extra protection

attributes.name: Hood
attributes.value: Adjustable hood protects your ears and neck with contrast mesh lining for extra comfort and protection when you step outdoors

attributes.name: Artwork
attributes.value: Reflective trim for low light visibility

attributes.name: Contents
attributes.value: Hazmat suits consist of a Jacket with hood attached and a Track-pant

product.description:
Available in all sizes from 5-6 years up to XL. Mom's & Dad's, When you buy for your kid buy one for you as well.
The Schoolay Defenders Packport Protection Suit is lightweight yet durable allowing you to wear it outdoors confidently. It gives full body protection making sure no liquid droplets can make its way to your body. It’s compact design allows it to fold away into its pocket and takes up very little space in your backpack and can be easily carried by an adult in their pocket.
Sizing Information: Loose fitting so you can combine the jacket with another second layer such as a T-shirt or a sweater.
Features:
Water Repellent:
Fabric is water repellent when it allows water to slide over its surface without seeping in. This prevents the fabric from swelling and keeps it lightweight, breathable, and warm.
Protection:
The water repellency fabric ensures no water droplet or any bacteria/viruses do not penetrate through to your skin.
Breathability:
Hydrophilic coating(RET=12) : Limits condensation inside the garment.
Compact Design : Folds away into its pocket to take up as little space as possible.

items.name: Stain Repeller Tees - Better Play Than Never

product.name: Stain Repeller Tees - Better Play Than Never

attributes.name: Art Work
attributes.value: Better Play Than Never embossed print

product.description:
Stain Repeller Tees - Let it Slide 

Childhood's about making a mess. And our stain-repellent Tees are about cleaning it up. 

Schoolay Stain Repeller Tees are a range of premium cotton, stain-repellent tees that let water-based stains such as aerated beverage, milk, etc slide off the surface.
Don't let the fear of stains come in the way of your children's memories. 

Let it slide.

Wash Care

  • Machine wash & tumble dry.
  • Use mild detergents
  • Do not use chlorine, bleach or fabric softeners.
  • Do not dry clean
  • Steam iron after wash & dry
